languages.text: After leaving a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж покидает зону Стратегического плана, ее эффекты продолжают на него действовать, пока он снова не войдет в любую зону Стратегического плана.

traits.locale_text: After leaving a Combat Tactics area, the wielder retains its effects until they move to another Combat Tactics area.
After leaving a Combat Tactics area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another Combat Tactics area.
After leaving a Combat Tactics area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another Combat Tactics area.

languages.text: Wielder retains buffs from Combat Strategy Zones after leaving them. Can only have one active Combat Strategy Zone buff.

traits.locale_text: Wielder retains buffs from Combat Strategy Zones after leaving them. Can only have one active Combat Strategy Zone buff.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, bir {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanından ayrıldıktan sonra başka bir {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanına girene dek kalkanın etkileri sürer.
languages.original_text: After leaving a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, bir Çatışma Taktikleri alanından ayrıldıktan sonra başka bir Çatışma Taktikleri alanına girene dek kalkanın etkileri sürer.

languages.text: Al salir de una zona de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}tácticas de combate{/g}, el portador conserva sus efectos hasta entrar en otra zona de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}tácticas de combate{/g}.
languages.original_text: After leaving a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area.

traits.locale_text: Al salir de una zona de tácticas de combate, el portador conserva sus efectos hasta entrar en otra zona de tácticas de combate.

languages.text: 当装备者离开{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域后，会继续保留该片区域的效果，直到装备者进入另一片{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域为止。
languages.original_text: After leaving a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者离开战斗策略区域后，会继续保留该片区域的效果，直到装备者进入另一片战斗策略区域为止。

languages.text: Quand l'utilisateur quitte une zone de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g}, il conserve ses effets jusqu'à ce qu'il en rejoigne une autre.
languages.original_text: After leaving a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area.

traits.locale_text: Quand l'utilisateur quitte une zone de Tactiques de combat, il conserve ses effets jusqu'à ce qu'il en rejoigne une autre.

languages.text: 軍略エリアを出た後、その使用者は別の軍略エリアに移動するまで、その効果を保持する。
languages.original_text: After leaving a Combat Tactics area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another Combat Tactics area.

traits.locale_text: 軍略エリアを出た後、その使用者は別の軍略エリアに移動するまで、その効果を保持する。

languages.text: Verlässt der Träger ein {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiet, behält er dessen Effekte bis zum Wechsel in ein anderes {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiet.

traits.locale_text: Verlässt der Träger ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet, behält er dessen Effekte bis zum Wechsel in ein anderes Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet.
